title.native: ラブライブ！サンシャイン!! 2nd Season

description:
After failing in the preliminary tournament of the previous Love Live, the members of Aqours have rededicated themselves to succeeding both as idols and as saviors of their school, making sure their home will never be taken away. But Mari learns some terrible news about their upcoming school open house event and it seems like all of their efforts will be for naught. Chika and her friends must find some way to preserve their school and carry on as idols. Either way, it looks like they'll need a miracle to get through this, fortunately, from µ's to Aqours, miracles are what idols do best.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

node.description:
[Website](http://www.yatate.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yatate_hajime) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/矢立肇) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hajime_Yatate)

Hajime Yatate is a collective pseudonym for [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/)'s staff.
Married to fellow animator [Kasumi Sakai](https://anilist.co/staff/188692).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

__Graduated:__ Tokyo College of Music

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/cut_tatsu7) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tatsuya__kato/)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1391356994)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東潤一)

Founder and representative director of Studio Easter.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kameari_Kanata)

__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

Sakurako’s work is based on her own experiences, with [Sister Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38414/) coming from having a brother, [Strawberry Panic!](https://anilist.co/manga/34974/) coming from attending an all-girls school, and [Baby Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38676/) from having a lot of cousins.

__[Website](https://anjuinami.com/) | [Profile (Sony Music Artists)](https://www.sma.co.jp/s/sma/artist/318?ima=0000#/news/0) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/anjuinami) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/anju_inami) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/anju_inami/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/AnjuInami/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeLkP_euFOvTo62tyRNFkEg)__

__Anju Inami__ is a Japanese stage actress, vocalist and voice actress currently affiliated with Sony Music Artists. She is the leader of musical unit Aqours.

__[Website](https://anjuinami.com/) | [Profile (Sony Music Artists)](https://www.sma.co.jp/s/sma/artist/318?ima=0000#/news/0) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/anjuinami) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/anju_inami) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/anju_inami/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/AnjuInami/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeLkP_euFOvTo62tyRNFkEg)__

__Anju Inami__ is a Japanese stage actress, vocalist and voice actress currently affiliated with Sony Music Artists. She is the leader of musical unit Aqours.

**Height:** 147 cm
**Hobbies:** Singing, drawing, watching anime

[Website](https://suzukiaina.jp/) | [Profile (IAM Agency)](http://iamagency.sukurepo.jp/actors/women/suzuki_aina) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aina_suzuki723) | [Agency Twitter](https://twitter.com/AinaSuzuki_Info) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpNypDVlaMyJDx7P8u3dd-A)

She debuted as a voice actress in 2014. She is also skilled in the Minyou (民謡) genre, which is a genre of traditional Japanese music, where she won many competitions.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Sakawa - Azur Lane (VG)

[Website](https://www.saitoshuka.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Saito_Shuka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/08saito_shuka16) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/shuka-saito/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNZixANYOD3NyepS2lsAArg)

A Japanese voice actress and singer currently affiliated with Holy Peak. Known for her role as You Watanabe in the multimedia franchise Love Live! Sunshine!!. Also works as a school idol for group Aqours, for the same franchise. In 2019, she made her solo debut as a musician under Sacra Music with the mini album "Kutsuhimo" (くつひも, Kutsuhimo). Later that year, she released the single "36℃/Papapa" (36℃/パパパ); the song "Papapa" was used as the opening theme to the anime series Oresuki.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Cerberus - Memento Mori (VG)

__Height:__ 164 cm

[Website](https://komiya-arisa.net/) | [Profile](http://www.box-corporation.com/arisa_komiya) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/box_komiyaarisa) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/arisakomiya_official/)

Her nickname is "Arisha." She is most known for voicing Dia Kurosawa in _Love Live! Sunshine!!_ She takes the center position during shows involving the third years, as well as AZALEA. She was also Yellow Buster/Yoko Usami in the 2012 Super Sentai series _Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters_ and Anzu Mikumo in 2013's _Innocent Lilies_.

Her image color during concerts is red.

__Height:__ 164 cm

[Website](https://komiya-arisa.net/) | [Profile](http://www.box-corporation.com/arisa_komiya) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/box_komiyaarisa) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/arisakomiya_official/)

Her nickname is "Arisha." She is most known for voicing Dia Kurosawa in _Love Live! Sunshine!!_ She takes the center position during shows involving the third years, as well as AZALEA. She was also Yellow Buster/Yoko Usami in the 2012 Super Sentai series _Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters_ and Anzu Mikumo in 2013's _Innocent Lilies_.

Her image color during concerts is red.

[Website](https://furihataai.jp/) | [Agency (Office-tb)](office-tb.com/furihata_ai/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/furihata_ai) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/furihatagram/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWfhLoV53Rwdc9WGw735IUg)

Her nicknames are "Aiai" and "Furirin". She voices Ruby Kurosawa in Love Live! Sunshine!!. She takes the center position during shows involving the first years.

**Height:** 150cm

[Website](https://rikakoaida.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Rikako_Aida) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aida_rikako_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfwvbv52NmPIHMIVDp3Jqrw)

Rikako Aida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Tokyo, Japan. She is best known for her role as Riko Sakurauchi from Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is affiliated with Ken Production.

On August 21, 2024, she made her VTuber debut as Rikyako (りきゃこ). 

**Non-anime roles:**
• Merlyn - Memento Mori (VG)
• Desert Flannel - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
• Quartz - Arknights (VG)
• CAWS - Girls' Frontline (VG)
• EM-2 - Girls' Frontline (VG)

[Website](https://www.saitoshuka.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Saito_Shuka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/08saito_shuka16) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/shuka-saito/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNZixANYOD3NyepS2lsAArg)

A Japanese voice actress and singer currently affiliated with Holy Peak. Known for her role as You Watanabe in the multimedia franchise Love Live! Sunshine!!. Also works as a school idol for group Aqours, for the same franchise. In 2019, she made her solo debut as a musician under Sacra Music with the mini album "Kutsuhimo" (くつひも, Kutsuhimo). Later that year, she released the single "36℃/Papapa" (36℃/パパパ); the song "Papapa" was used as the opening theme to the anime series Oresuki.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Cerberus - Memento Mori (VG)

**Height:** 150cm

[Website](https://rikakoaida.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Rikako_Aida) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aida_rikako_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfwvbv52NmPIHMIVDp3Jqrw)

Rikako Aida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Tokyo, Japan. She is best known for her role as Riko Sakurauchi from Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is affiliated with Ken Production.

On August 21, 2024, she made her VTuber debut as Rikyako (りきゃこ). 

**Non-anime roles:**
• Merlyn - Memento Mori (VG)
• Desert Flannel - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
• Quartz - Arknights (VG)
• CAWS - Girls' Frontline (VG)
• EM-2 - Girls' Frontline (VG)

Trivia: She is the tallest of all of the Aqours actresses On December 28, 2024, she officially announced on her social media that she married someone of Indian descent, being the first in her group to be officially married. [Website](https://takatsukikanako.com) | [Profile (Amuse)](https://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/takatsuki_kanako/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kanako_tktk?) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanako.tktk/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMlThy0EvSm7O0FhsUwk61Q)

__Nicknames:__ Suwawa (すわわ), Osuwa (おすわ), Suwa-chan (すわちゃん)
__Height:__ 157cm

[Website (Columbia)](https://columbia.jp/suwananaka/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/suwananaka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/n.suwawagram/)

[Website](https://kobayashiaika.jp/s/n85/?ima=2313) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aikyan_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kyanstagram_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNG7L36HtofjQk0FduxLxpw)

She's good at dancing. Her father is Japanese, while her mother is half Japanese and Korean. She learned ballet at the age of 5 and hip hop at third year of elementary school.

In 2011, she debuted as a singer for TV anime [Freezing](https://anilist.co/anime/9367/Freezing/) ending theme, "Kimi o Mamoritai" (君を守りたい) and was released as a split single with its opening theme. In 2012, she released a single for TV anime [Queen's Blade Rebellion](https://anilist.co/anime/11859/Queens-Blade-Rebellion/) ending theme, "Future is Serious". Both singles are released under Media Factory's record labels.

In 2015, she debuted as a voice actress with [Love Live! Sunshine!!](https://anilist.co/anime/21584/Love-Live-Sunshine/) as [Yoshiko Tsushima](https://anilist.co/character/89849/Yoshiko-Tsushima). She belongs to the idol group Aqours and its sub unit Guilty Kiss along with Rikako Aida and Aina Suzuki. She is nicknamed "Aikyan" by both fans and Aqours members.

In November 2016, she was announced to be one of the permanent hosts in Love Live! Sunshine!!'s radio program along with Anju Inami and Arisa Komiya.

Designed [her own parka](https://vvstore.jp/feature/detail/12383/).

**Height:** 147 cm
**Hobbies:** Singing, drawing, watching anime
